scripts.build: npm test && rm -rf ./artifact || true && mkdir artifact && cp -R src artifact/ || true && cp -R node_modules artifact/ && cp index.js artifact/ && cp package.json artifact/ && cd artifact && zip -r covid-backend.zip ./*
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd deployment && rm plan.tf || true && terraform init && terraform import aws_lambda_function.GPCovidResponse-Invite GPCovidResponse-Invite || true && terraform plan -out plan.tf && terraform apply plan.tf
scripts.deploy:sdlc: npm run build && cd deployment && rm plan.tf || true && ../terraform init && ../terraform import aws_lambda_function.GPCovidResponse-Invite GPCovidResponse-Invite || true && ../terraform plan -out plan.tf && ../terraform apply plan.tf
